AT.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
AT.description: Wenn Wario einen Zauberstab in die Finger kriegt, der ihn in ein anderes Wesen verwandelt, wird aus unserem diebischen Unhold dann ein Meister der Maske oder ein Meister der Pannen? Wario springt durch seine TV-Bildschirm und verwandelt sich zum Star einer Weltreisesendung, die ihn auf seiner Schatzsuche durch 10 "Episoden" begleitet. Von einem Kreuzfahrschiff bis hin zu den ägyptischen Pyramiden ist alles dabei! Du kannst den Tochscreen benutzen, um Wario zu verwandeln: male ihm einen Schweif an, und er wird zum feuerspeienden Dragon Wario, oder zeichne ihm einen Astronautenhelm, und schon wird er zu Cosmic Wario, bewaffnet mit einer Laserkanone!

AU.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
AU.description: When Wario gets his mitts on a magic wand that can change his identity, will the thieving fiend become a master of disguise or a master of disaster? Jumping through his TV screen, Wario becomes the star of a globe-trotting show; taking him through 10 “episodes” from a luxury liner to an Egyptian pyramid in his quest for loot. Use the touch screen to transform Wario into various guises: draw a tail on him to become Dragon Wario with fiery breath, or sketch a space helmet to become Cosmic Wario armed with a laser blaster!

BG.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
BG.description: When Wario gets his mitts on a magic wand that can change his identity, will the thieving fiend become a master of disguise or a master of disaster? Jumping through his TV screen, Wario becomes the star of a globe-trotting show; taking him through 10 “episodes” from a luxury liner to an Egyptian pyramid in his quest for loot. Use the touch screen to transform Wario into various guises: draw a tail on him to become Dragon Wario with fiery breath, or sketch a space helmet to become Cosmic Wario armed with a laser blaster!

BE.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
BE.description: Wario a mis la main sur une baguette magique qui lui permet de changer d'identité. Ce fieffé voleur passera-t-il maître dans l'art du déguisement, ou bien dans l'art du désastre ? Après avoir traversé l'écran de sa télé, Wario devient la star d'une émission qui fait le tour du monde ; diffusée en 10 « épisodes », elle le fait voyager d'un paquebot de luxe à une pyramide égyptienne, afin de satisfaire sa soif de butin. Utilisez l'écran tactile pour transformer Wario de différentes façons : dessinez-lui une queue pour en faire Dragon Wario au souffle de feu, ou créez un casque spatial pour qu'il devienne Cosmic Wario et soit armé d'un pistolet laser !

ES.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
ES.description: Wario se ha hecho con una varita mágica que le permite cambiar de identidad. ¿Se convertirá nuestro ladrón en un maestro del disfraz o de la calamidad? Al introducirse en la pantalla de su televisor, Wario se convierte en la estrella de un programa de viajes por el mundo. A lo largo de 10 "episodios", visitará desde un trasatlántico de lujo hasta una pirámide egipcia en busca de tesoros. Usa la pantalla táctil para transformar a Wario de diferentes formas: ¡dibújale una cola para convertirlo en Wario Dragón con sus abrasadoras llamaradas o píntale un casco espacial para que se convierta en Cosmo Wario, armado con una pistola láser!

IT.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
IT.description: Wario è riuscito a mettere le mani su una bacchetta magica che gli permette di cambiare identità! Riuscirà quella canaglia a diventare del travestimento un maestro? Oppure un maestro un po' maldestro? Saltando nello schermo della sua TV, Wario diventa la stella giramondo di uno show televisivo in 10 "episodi" che lo porteranno da una nave di lusso fino ad una piramide egizia nella sua ricerca del saccheggio perfetto. Usa il touch screen per trasformare Wario: disegna una coda per trasformarlo in Wario Drago dal respiro infuocato, oppure disegna un casco spaziale per trasformarlo in Wario Cosmico armato di pistola laser!

LT.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
LT.description: When Wario gets his mitts on a magic wand that can change his identity, will the thieving fiend become a master of disguise or a master of disaster? Jumping through his TV screen, Wario becomes the star of a globe-trotting show; taking him through 10 “episodes” from a luxury liner to an Egyptian pyramid in his quest for loot. NL.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
NL.description: Wanneer Wario een magische staf in zijn handen krijgt waarmee hij zijn identiteit kan veranderen, zal de duistere dief veranderen in een meester in vermomming of een meester in onheil? Als hij door zijn TV-scherm springt, wordt Wario de ster van een show die hem in tien "afleveringen" over de hele wereld brengt, van een luxe cruiseschip tot een Egyptische pyramide, in zijn zoektocht naar buit. Maak gebruik van het touchscreen om Wario in verschillende gedaantes te veranderen: geef hem een staart en hij verandert in een vuurspuwende Dragon Wario, of schets een ruimtehelm om hem te veranderen in Cosmic Wario, gewapend met een lasergeweer.

NZ.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
NZ.description: When Wario gets his mitts on a magic wand that can change his identity, will the thieving fiend become a master of disguise or a master of disaster? Jumping through his TV screen, Wario becomes the star of a globe-trotting show; taking him through 10 “episodes” from a luxury liner to an Egyptian pyramid in his quest for loot. Use the touch screen to transform Wario into various guises: draw a tail on him to become Dragon Wario with fiery breath, or sketch a space helmet to become Cosmic Wario armed with a laser blaster!

PL.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
PL.description: When Wario gets his mitts on a magic wand that can change his identity, will the thieving fiend become a master of disguise or a master of disaster? Jumping through his TV screen, Wario becomes the star of a globe-trotting show; taking him through 10 “episodes” from a luxury liner to an Egyptian pyramid in his quest for loot. Use the touch screen to transform Wario into various guises: draw a tail on him to become Dragon Wario with fiery breath, or sketch a space helmet to become Cosmic Wario armed with a laser blaster!

PT.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
PT.description: Quando o trapaceiro Wario deita as luvas a uma varinha mágica que o pode fazer mudar de identidade, irá tornar-se um mestre do disfarce ou um mestre do desastre? Atravessando o ecrã da sua TV, Wario torna-se a estrela de um espetáculo itinerante que o leva ao longo de 10 «episódios», desde um cruzeiro de luxo até uma pirâmide do Egito, em busca de tesouros. Usa o ecrã tátil para transformar o Wario, dando-lhe várias aparências: desenha-lhe uma cauda para se tornar o Dragon Wario e cuspir fogo ou rabisca um capacete espacial para se tornar o Cosmic Wario, armado com uma pistola de raios laser!

RU.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
RU.description: Заполучив магическую палочку, которая может менять обличие любого человека, станет ли Варио мастером маскировки или же мастером неудач? Прокладывая свой путь, прыжок за прыжком, через телеэкран, Варио становится всемирно известным путешественником. В поисках добычи ему придется пройти через десять эпизодов, от роскошного лайнера до Египетских пирамид. Используйте сенсорный дисплей чтобы менять облик Варио: чтобы превратить его в огнедышащего Dragon Wario, дорисуйте ему хвост; или же дорисуйте ему космический шлем, чтобы превратить его в Cosmic Wario, вооруженного лазерной пушкой!

SE.name: Wario™ Master of Disguise
SE.description: When Wario gets his mitts on a magic wand that can change his identity, will the thieving fiend become a master of disguise or a master of disaster? Jumping through his TV screen, Wario becomes the star of a globe-trotting show; taking him through 10 “episodes” from a luxury liner to an Egyptian pyramid in his quest for loot.
